revision.text:
<!--싱글_정보-->
{{TemplateMapping
| mapToClass = Single
| mappings =
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 곡명 | ontologyProperty = title }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 음악가 | ontologyProperty = musicalArtist }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 음악가 | ontologyProperty = musicalBand }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 음반 | ontologyProperty = album }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = A 사이드 | ontologyProperty = aSide }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = B 사이드 | ontologyProperty = bSide }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 발매일 | ontologyProperty = releaseDate }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 포맷 | ontologyProperty = format }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 녹음 | ontologyProperty = recordedIn }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 녹음 | ontologyProperty = recordDate }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 장르 | ontologyProperty = genre }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 언어 | ontologyProperty = language }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 길이 | ontologyProperty = runtime | unit = minute }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 레이블 | ontologyProperty = recordLabel }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 프로듀서 | ontologyProperty = producer }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 이전싱글 | ontologyProperty = previousWork }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 다음싱글 | ontologyProperty = subsequentWork }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 작사가 | ontologyProperty = writer }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 작곡가 | ontologyProperty = composer }}

end}}

 
<!-- Not Yet Mapping
| 오디오 샘플 = 
| 판매량      = 
| 이번싱글    = 
-->
